content: अवरोधनं {@--1@} A siege, blockade. {@--2@} Hindering, obstructing. {@--3@} An obstacle, impediment. {@--4@} A closed or private place. {@--5@} The innermost part of anything. {@--6@} The inner or women's apartments in a royal palace; राजावरोधनवधूरवतारयंतः <ls>Śi. 5. 18</ls>; अवरोधने स्थास्यति <ls>Dk. 120.</ls> {@--7@} An inmate of the harem, a queen, wife; अवरोधनानि सिंधोः <ls>Śi. 8. 8</ls> (समुद्रमहिष्यो नद्यः).
